seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 1
seikengakuin.description:
BATTLES FOR ANCIENT KINGDOMS ARE NOTHING COMPARED TO THE BATTLES OF A CLASSROOM!
Awakening from magical stasis after a thousand years, the Dark Lord Leonis suddenly finds himself in the body of a ten-year-old boy! He quickly meets Riselia, a girl confronting the Voids, creatures that have nearly exterminated humanity. Determined to uncover the mysteries of this strange new era, Leonis enrolls in Excalibur Academy, a school that trains students to fight back against these enigmatic monsters. Could the Voids hold some connection to Leonis’s past?

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 2
seikengakuin.description: A MYSTERIOUS HIJACK ON THE HIGH SEAS! When a princess visits the Seventh Assault Garden, Leonis believes it’s a chance to expand his influence as a Dark Lord. Unfortunately, the celebrations are cut short by a Void attack. Things get only more treacherous when a rebel group seizes control of the princess’s ship! Leonis and the rest of his squad plan to retake the vessel, but there appears to be more at work than a simple insurrection. And why does Regina seem to know so much about the princess?

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 3
seikengakuin.description: RISELIA’S HOMECOMING. Six years ago, Riselia lost her home and family during the Void Stampede that destroyed the Third Assault Garden. Only she and Regina were thought to have survived, yet the floating city has mysteriously reappeared-and it’s broadcasting a distress signal. Leonis and the girls of the eighteenth platoon are sent to investigate, but they end up stumbling into a situation far more perilous than they expected. Even the power of the greatest Dark Lord may not be enough to save them this time!

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 4
seikengakuin.description:
AN OLD FRIEND RETURNS
With a holiday called the Holy Light Festival fast approaching, the girls of the eighteenth platoon decide to host a haunted café in their dorm. The event is meant to celebrate the arrival of the Sixth Assault Garden, home to Elfiné’s older sister, Clauvia. The mischievous woman is part of a research team that recently made an incredible discovery in the northern tundra-a massive creature sealed in impervious ice. Much to his astonishment, Leonis recognizes the winged beast as an old rival he never managed to beat. When the monster is set loose to wreak havoc, will Leonis manage to take it down in time?

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 5
seikengakuin.description: THE GODDESS’S CALL A recent rash of incidents has seen Holy Swords spiraling out of control and becoming twisted weapons known as Demon Swords. No one is sure as to the cause, but every Holy Swordsman affected claims to have heard the voice of a goddess, a detail that catches Leonis’s attention. However, there’s no time to investigate, as he and the rest of the eighteenth platoon are sent on a mission with other students to eradicate a Void Hive that crops up in Necrozoa-the site where Riselia found Leonis. So many Voids appearing in such a conspicuous place…could this be connected to the Demon Swords and Leonis’s past?

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 6
seikengakuin.description:
THE PRICE OF VENGEANCE
Nine years ago, Sakuya lost her home and sister to a powerful Void Lord. She’s dedicated her life to fighting the Voids ever since. However, when a group of the Sakura Orchid’s greatest fighters, the Kenki Gathering, contact her with a plan to use the Seventh Assault Garden as bait for the Void Lord, she’s left in a difficult position. While she wants revenge, it can’t come at the cost of her new home, but Sakuya can’t stop the Kenki Gathering by herself. Fortunately, she knows someone who might be able to help...a Dark Lord!

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 7
seikengakuin.description: An unexpected invitation to the prestigious Holy Sword Blade Dance Festival sends the members of the eighteenth platoon on a trip to the First Assault Garden—Camelot. It’s hardly a relaxing trip for the group, though. The First Assault Garden is home to the Phillet Company, and Elfiné is determined to uncover more about its mysterious Demon Sword Project. To that end, she asks for Leonis to help her infiltrate a massive casino. Naturally, matters of espionage are no trouble for the Undead King, but things get more complicated when Veira arrives in a frenzy. Someone has managed to take control of the Dragon Lord as well as another Dark Lord...

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 8
seikengakuin.description: The Holy Sword Dance Festival is fast approaching, and while Riselia and the other girls of the eighteenth platoon are training hard, Leonis is still missing. He and two other Dark Lords have been spirited away to some strange dimension ruled by Voids and are forced to search the desolate landscape for a way home. Meanwhile, the sinister forces behind the D Project plot to bring Camelot to ruin. A world apart, Riselia and Leonis desperately wish to see each other again, but will they survive long enough for a reunion?

seikengakuin.title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Vol. 9
seikengakuin.description: Leonis and Riselia finally reunite amidst disaster in the imperial city. And although the Voids are being pushed back, they have a new problem: Leonis’s minion, Rakshasa Nightmare. Meanwhile, Prince Alexios, hoping to defeat the Voids once and for all, searches for any surviving Dark Lords and unwittingly contacts Leonis! During all this trouble, a mysterious person known as the Queen of the Realm of Shadows plots from the dark...
